

Summary of words included in the Amalgamated Greek NT:
=====================================
TYPES OF WORD	NUMBERS IN THE AMALGAMATED NT, AND THE TYPES OF BIBLES THEY ARE TRANSLATED IN.	EDITIONS:     BLUE=NA, RED=TR, GREEN=OTHERS	VARIANTS*	
 = in NA; same in TR	 133149 words translated in traditional (eg KJV) and modern Bibles (eg ESV, NIV).	NA27/28+TR+other editions all have this same word	7 variants in other editions	
 = in NA: differs in TR	 3911 words that might be translated differently in traditional and modern Bibles.	NA27/28 has a word that differs from TR and perhaps others	3207 variants in TR and 733 in others
 = not in NA; is in TR=-	 3891 words that are translated in the KJV but not in most modern Bibles.	TR   has a word that is not present in NA27 nor usually in others	33 variants in other editions	
 = in NA; not in TR=₊	 814 words that are translated in most modern Bibles but not in the KJV.	NA27 has a word that is not present in TR   nor usually in others	10 variants in other editions	
 = not in NA nor TR=±	 261 words occuring in other editions that are rarely translated in Bibles.	Some editions have a word that is not present in TR or NA27/28	
* Note: All variants are included that have differences in grammar. Spelling variations are not included unless it is a name that would be pronounced significantly differently. Variants in bold should affect translation.									



# Mat.1.6	Ἰεσσαὶ 	δὲ 	ἐγέννησεν 	τὸν 	Δαυὶδ 	τὸν 	βασιλέα· 	Δαυὶδ 	δὲ 	- T=ὁ 	- N=βασιλεὺς 	ἐγέννησεν 	τὸν 	Σολομῶνα 	ἐκ 	τῆς 	τοῦ 	Οὐρίου·
